title: unniDam Odi varuvEn
sahitya:
unniDam Odi varuvEn un tuNai nADip-peravE cennaik-kandak-kOTTam manram vITra murugA nAn


anupallavi

  ennaik-kaNDadumE nI irakkam mighak-koNDu anbODu aravaNaittu AtkoNDaruLavE


caraNam    ponnaDi unadE en pughaliDam enak-karudi panmurai en kuraiyai unniDam muraiyiTTu
enniru karam Endi idayam nI karaiyavE panmurai paNindun pAdap-prasAdam kOri
